Text: Hi, this is Michelle from Comcast.
How may I help you today?
Hello, my name is Tom.
I've been having problems with my cable
What seems to be the issue sir?
My on Demand is not working.
Alright sir
We will look into this
We just have to verify your account
Can you provide me with your account number?
Thank you, and can you provide the full name of the account holder?
Tom White
Thanks.  One last thing, can you verify the account holders date of birth?
It is 13 April 1988
Thanks sir.  I have your account pulled up.
I can see there is no upstream signal coming from your box.
What does that mean?
It means that while you can watch channels that don't require two way communication, you can't watch content that requires input and output.
Oh, so anything where I request a stream?
Exactly sir.  Can you turn off the cable box for me?
Yes, it is done.
Alright sir, just a moment until I see the device go offline
It is now offline, so you can plug it back in.
It's booting up
I can see that the device is now back online, and showing a strong signal for upload and download
Yes, on demand is working again
Very good.  Have I resolved your problem today sir?
Yes you have, thank you very much
Are there any other issues that you would like to address?
I think you have solved everything
You have a great day sir.
Thank you for calling Comcast Support.  Bye
Goodbye
